definition: To prepare food by using heat in an enclosed space, typically an oven or similar appliance. This action involves transforming raw ingredients into a cooked or baked form, often resulting in a crusty or browned exterior. It is commonly employed for various culinary creations, including bread, pastries, cakes, and other baked goods.

examples.german: Meine Mutter backt immer frisches Brot.
examples.english: My mother always bakes fresh bread.

examples.german: Wir haben gestern einen Apfelkuchen gebacken.
examples.english: We baked an apple pie yesterday.
